def.p: A risk is a custom, non-IFC entity representing a safety or an economic risk.
It is tied to zero, one or multiple s.
The risk can be associated with zero, one or multiple s. If there are no s defined, the risk is considered unconfined. If there is one or more s defined, the risk applies only to these zones.
